metadata.title: CVE-2023-1555 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from15.2 before 16.1.5, all versions starting from 16.2 before 16.2.5, allversions starting from 16.3 before 16.3.1. A namespace-level banned usercan access the API.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
